name: Display enemy damage
author: Jamian
info: When the player hits an enemy, the damage inflicted to that enemy briefly appears above its sprite. This could be a useful addition to RPG-oriented quests, and would also make the half/quarter damage options in the enemy editor more useful.Warning: it works well with regular enemies, but will behave funkily with some of the more complex Z1 enemies, such as Gleeok, Moldorm, etc.
description: Step 1: Set up the constants at the top of the script according to your needs.Step 2: Paste the code in your script file.Step 3: Add the line   EnemyDamage();   in the loop of your active global script.
